metadata.dc:author: Andonegui Navarro, J
metadata.dc:description: A great number of systemic diseases can exhibit ocular manifestations during their evolution. These ocular alterations may cause symptoms by themselves, but can also be useful in diagnosing or monitoring the evolution of the systemic condition. The main characteristics of several systemic diseases exhibiting some kind of ocular sign are highlighted. These diseases will be described in detail in this issue.
metadata.dc:title: Manifestaciones oculares de las enfermedades sist√©micas.
[Ocular manifestations of systemic diseases].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales del sistema sanitario de Navarra
